response.overview: Blind and Deaf tells the story of a man named David, who believes in Covid and denies the existence of God, then his friend named Jabar, a religious person but denies the existence of Covid, they meet in quarantine conditions that force them to meet in a reunion with 3 other friends.
response.tagline: they are not blind, but they do not see. they are not deaf but they do not hear
response.title: Blind & Deaf
